title: Magic & Spells
description: Explore the magical world of Frieren!

questions.question: What is Frieren's signature offensive spell?
questions.explanation: Zoltraak is Frieren's main attack spell - once a demon's ultimate spell, now common due to human mages analyzing and replicating it!

questions.question: Frieren can suppress her mana to appear weaker than she is.
questions.explanation: Flamme taught Frieren to constantly suppress her mana, making her appear much weaker - a technique she's used for over 1000 years!

questions.question: What type of spell does Frieren collect that others consider useless?
questions.explanation: Frieren loves collecting 'useless' spells like making flowers bloom, creating sweet grapes, or cleaning clothes - finding joy in the mundane!

questions.question: How do demons primarily use magic differently from humans?

options.text: They speak in the demon language to cast
They don't use magic at all

questions.explanation: Demons cast magic through the demon language, using words as power - which is why they're vulnerable when humans learn their spells!

questions.question: Serie knows almost every spell in existence.
questions.explanation: Serie has lived for thousands of years and collected nearly every spell known to exist - she can grant any spell to those she deems worthy!

questions.question: What spell did Flamme specialize in that helped defeat many demons?
questions.explanation: Flamme created a spell to see through demons' glamour and illusions, which she passed to Frieren - crucial for fighting demons!

questions.question: What determines a mage's power in Frieren's world?
questions.explanation: A mage's power is determined by their mana pool and how efficiently they can control it - which is why hiding mana is so effective!

questions.question: Fern is exceptionally talented at suppressing her mana like Frieren.
questions.explanation: Fern inherited Frieren's teaching on mana suppression and is incredibly talented at it - even surprising Frieren with her control!
